title: Exomars LMC Additional Interim Funding
abstractText: This funding is to accelerate redesign and resteting of Life Marker Chip following its confirmation as part of the payload on ExoMars.
impactText: This award was part of a series of awards for Life Marker Chip for ExoMars missions and is grouped as such with other awards. Please see ST/I00209X/1 for further details
findingsText: This grant was part of a series devloping an instrument to look for organics on Mars using antibody technology to latch onto relevant molecules. The work has implications for solvent extraction of organics and detection of organics. The project was cancelled in 2013 due to descoping of ExoMars payload and knowledge is now pending application. Aerospace, Defence and Marine,Agriculture, Food and Drink,Healthcare
